leitej.exception.XmlInvalidLtException

  • Packages that use XmlInvalidLtException 
    Package Description
    leitej.exception

    • Uses of XmlInvalidLtException in leitej.exception

      Subclasses of XmlInvalidLtException in leitej.exception 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  XmlomInvalidLtException
      The class XmlomInvalidLtException and its subclasses are a form of XmlInvalidLtException that indicates conditions that a reasonable application might want to catch.
      class  XmlomSecurityLtException
      The class XmlomSecurityLtException and its subclasses are a form of XmlomInvalidLtException that indicates conditions that a reasonable application might want to catch.
